body:
@DV Lmao exactly.

The thing about this story is that it has enough detail that can be good for immersion, but there are things that just don't make sense so it ends up having the opposite effects. For machines that control the human race, how are there so many bugs? What is even the point of humans? What could humans produce better than robots that robots would want? Why the heck does the uterus need to be cleaned with a mop after childbirth? Why squeeze an ovary when ovulation can be induced? Stabbing holes in the abdomen to release semen?? Why? It's not a bug if robots have a solution to the issue. So many questions.
Glad I took the time out of my day to read this shit
I know one has to suspend belief because it's hentai, but this is so damn stupid...
